about_the_game:
Dear reader this page will be changing consistently during the development process, thank you for your patience.

Take command of your custom-built beast in KILLDOZER. Unleash instinctive combat in a fully destructible world where chaos reigns. Plan your assault, obliterate every obstacle, and shatter the limits of mayhem. Get. Your. Revenge.

A SIMULATED EXPERIENCE:  We hope to provide you the player a faithfully accurate first person experience (VR and Desktop) to how it would be in your very own Killdozer. The accuracy we are going for will go from the weapons used, the camera setup, all the way to the scale of the town and what your Killdozer would go up against.


TACTILE AND TACTICLE:
The controls for the Killdozer are not only accurate to the real world counterpart, but are incredibly fine tuned to make for smooth gameplay, 
Features (Currently):
- VR gameplay (Soon desktop).
- Bulldozer Driving.
- Bucket and claw manipulation.
- Destructible Props (Ever growing list).
- Chasing police cars that will actively track and hunt down the player.
- Mounted Firearms.
- Camera system.

Mature Content Description:

The game has depictions of suicide, depression, course language and violence.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game was cooked up for you by the chefs at Rename For Value and Reekid entertainment pty ltd, Enjoy.
